category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: AMPatternMatchStyle
preference.preference_description: Indicates the pattern matching style to use while evaluating Access Manager rules. Valid Values: *1: Uses "%" for multi-char replacements and use "_" for single char replacements. *2: Uses "*" for multi-char replacements and use "." for single char replacements. *3: Uses "*" for multi-char replacements and use "?" for single char replacements. This is the default value.
